SEARCH

Class RegularPolygon

java.lang.Object
Shape
RegularPolygon
public class RegularPolygon extends Shape
A class used to model regular n-sided polygons.
Author:
marcussze

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    RegularPolygon()
    A constructor for building a regular 3-sided polygon with a radius of 1.0.
    RegularPolygon(int n)
    A constructor for building a regular n-sided polygon with a radius of 1.0.
    RegularPolygon(int n, double r)
    A constructor for building a regular n-sided polygon with a radius of r.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    contains(double x, double y)
    A method for determining if a point (x, y) in the canvas coordinate system is contained by the regular n-sided polygon, a point is considered to be contained by a polygon if it lies either completely inside the polygon, or on any of the sides or vertices of the polygon.
    int
    getNumOfSides()
    A method for retrieving the number of sides of the regular polygon.
    double
    getRadius()
    A method for retrieving the radius of the regular polygon.
    void
    setNumOfSides(int n)
    A method for setting the number of sides of the regular n-sided polygon, this method will reset the local coordinates of the vertices of the regular n-sided polygon.
    void
    setRadius(double r)
    A method for setting the radius of the regular n-sided polygon, this method will reset the local coordinates of the vertices of the regular n-sided polygon.

    getColor, getFilled, getTheta, getX, getXc, getXLocal, getY, getYc, getYLocal, rotate, setColor, setFilled, setTheta, setXc, setXLocal, setYc, setYLocal, translate

  • Constructor Details

    • RegularPolygon

      public RegularPolygon(int n, double r)
      A constructor for building a regular n-sided polygon with a radius of r.
      Parameters:
      n - the number of sides of the polygon, if its value is less than 3, the number of sides will be set to 3
      r - the radius, if its value is less than 0, it will be set to 0

    • RegularPolygon

      public RegularPolygon(int n)
      A constructor for building a regular n-sided polygon with a radius of 1.0.
      Parameters:
      n - the number of sides of the polygon, if its value is less than 3, the number of sides will be set to 3

    • RegularPolygon

      public RegularPolygon()
      A constructor for building a regular 3-sided polygon with a radius of 1.0.

  • Method Details

    • getNumOfSides

      public int getNumOfSides()
      A method for retrieving the number of sides of the regular polygon.
      Returns:
      the number of sides of the regular polygon

    • getRadius

      public double getRadius()
      A method for retrieving the radius of the regular polygon.

    • setNumOfSides

      public void setNumOfSides(int n)
      A method for setting the number of sides of the regular n-sided polygon, this method will reset the local coordinates of the vertices of the regular n-sided polygon.

    • setRadius

      public void setRadius(double r)
      A method for setting the radius of the regular n-sided polygon, this method will reset the local coordinates of the vertices of the regular n-sided polygon.

    • contains

      public boolean contains(double x, double y)
      A method for determining if a point (x, y) in the canvas coordinate system is contained by the regular n-sided polygon, a point is considered to be contained by a polygon if it lies either completely inside the polygon, or on any of the sides or vertices of the polygon.
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of the point
      y - y coordinate of the point
      Returns:
      true if the point is contained by the regular n-sided polygon, otherwise false
